title: Mining Tech Survey Report
description: Resource landing page highlighting survey findings with lead capture

option-a.name: Option A
option-a.emphasis: Two-column hero with preview card, streamlined overview, FAQ before form
option-a.when: Push conversions above the fold when traffic is already intent-rich and familiar with VRIFY
option-a.hypothesis: If we keep the CTA in constant view for the operations sponsor, we increase qualified demo requests from high-intent return visitors.

option-b.name: Option B
option-b.emphasis: Hero includes quick form, findings grouped by themes, methodology + FAQ mid-page
option-b.when: Hook evaluators skimming for proof while still converting high-intent visitors quickly
option-b.hypothesis: If we foreground survey takeaways before the form, digital workflow evaluators will feel confident enough to submit without leaving.

option-c.name: Option C
option-c.emphasis: Methodology snapshot appears pre-section, elevated methodology layout, FAQ for objections
option-c.when: Reassure skeptical stakeholders who need to vet rigor before sharing the report
option-c.hypothesis: If we prove methodological rigor up front, skeptical stakeholders will feel safe sharing the asset internally and convert.

sections.name: Hero
sections.whyNow: Orient visitors and expose the primary CTA immediately

jtbd.situation: Visitor lands from Resources, social, or email
jtbd.motivation: Confirm what this page is and the primary action
jtbd.outcome: Confidence to scan highlights or proceed to the form

sections.name: Report Overview
sections.whyNow: Preview scope and deliverables before the form to reduce friction

jtbd.situation: Stakeholders decide if the PDF merits a form fill
jtbd.motivation: Understand the report's scope and what is delivered after submission
jtbd.outcome: Clear value perception and readiness to submit the form

sections.name: Key Findings
sections.whyNow: Showcase thematic insights that tease value without giving away the full story

jtbd.motivation: See credible first-party proof points fast
jtbd.outcome: Desire to access the full dataset

sections.name: Methodology Snapshot
sections.whyNow: Establish credibility at a glance without derailing the highlights narrative

jtbd.motivation: Confirm first-party independence, sample, and timing
jtbd.outcome: Trust to proceed with download and circulate internally

jtbd.motivation: Answer questions about sample, methods, and objectivity
jtbd.outcome: Confidence in data quality and willingness to act on insights

sections.name: FAQ
sections.whyNow: Catch latent concerns before the conversion point

jtbd.motivation: Find quick answers without leaving the page

sections.name: Get the Report
sections.whyNow: Convert once value and trust are established

jtbd.outcome: Receive the PDF and enter the thank-you flow

sections.name: Related Resources
sections.whyNow: Offer a safe path for non-converters at the end

jtbd.situation: Some users aren't ready to download
jtbd.outcome: Stay in the ecosystem and return to convert later

targetAudience: Technical/digital evaluator influencing tools and workflows
